BCG Unified API's Documentation

Browse the latest developer documentation including API reference, articles, and sample code.

Home
Home Description Code Samples Performance

Objects

LocationAPI

Graph based API to get Location or Location.

Field Type Description
location Location Navigate location graph via this query, you will use this if you have access to location code otherwise use search query. Returns an Location object.
locationbyIds [Location] Navigate location graph via this query, you will use this if you have access to location code otherwise use search query. Returns an collection Location object.
search [Location] Lookup location by name, title or any other information you know. Returns the matching location objects as an array.
searchfilter [Location] Lookup location by name, title or any other information you know. Returns the matching location objects as an array.
locations [Location] Returns all location which exists sorted in ascending order by officeCode
hotels [Hotel] Lookup for hotels in given location. Returns hotel in the location in a array
airports [Airport] Lookup for airports in given location. Returns airports in the location in a array
searchByAddress [Location] Search for the given text and return collection of location data using third party api.This locations are not available in location master

Location

Location Type - object for the office location

Field Type Description
id String Unique office code
name String Office name
regionId String Unique region id of the office
street String Street where office is located
street2 String Street where office is located
street3 String Street where office is located
city String City of office
state String State of Office
zipCode String Zip-code of office
country String Country of office
countryCode String Country code of office
geoLocation GeoLocation Geolocation has latitude and longitude
phone String Phone number of office
imageUrl String Link to an office image
contentLinks [ContentType] Contents inside the office location
timezone String Time zone of the location
weather Weather current weather for the location
locationType String Location type

GeoLocation

GeoLocation Type - object for latitude and longitude

Field Type Description
lat String Latitude of a geo location
lon String Longitude of a geo location

ContentType

Object representation for the ContentLink

Field Type Description
name String Name of the content
link String Link to the content
image String Icon name for the content

Weather

Weather Model

Field Type Description
icon String Weather icon to be used
description String Weather description of the description
temperature [WeatherUnit] Temperature in both celcius and farenheit

WeatherUnit

Weather Unit Model

Field Type Description
type String Unit Type- Celcius or Farenheit
value Float Current temperature

Hotel

Hotel Type - object for the Hotel location

Field Type Description
id String Unique Hotel code
name String Hotel name
street String Street where Hotel is located
city String City of Hotel
state String State of Hotel
zipCode String Zip-code of Hotel
country String Country of Hotel
address String Country code of Hotel
geoLocation GeoLocation Geolocation has latitude and longitude
phone String Phone number of Hotel
imageUrl String Link to an Hotel image
contentLinks [ContentType] Contents inside the Hotel location
ratings String User ratings for the Hotel
distance Float Distance from the office location
preferred Boolean BCG Preferred hotel

Airport

Airport Type - object for the airport location

Field Type Description
id String Unique airport code
name String Airport name
street String Street where airport is located
city String City of airport
state String State of airport
zipCode String Zip-code of airport
country String Country of airport
address String Country code of airport
geoLocation GeoLocation Geolocation has latitude and longitude
phone String Phone number of airport
imageUrl String Link to an airport image
contentLinks [ContentType] Contents inside the airport location
ratings String User ratings for the airport
distance Float Distance from the office location

LocationAPIMutation

GraphQL mutation to update location

Field Type Description
updateLocation Location Update the location
addLocation Location Add the location
markHotelPreferred Hotel Mark the hotel as preferred
